thread.title: Behind the Scenes: Costuming Performers for the Main Street Electrical Parade at Disneyland Park
thread.title_full: Behind the Scenes: Costuming Performers for the Main Street Electrical Parade at Disneyland Park

author: Shawn Slater
title: Behind the Scenes: Costuming Performers for the Main Street Electrical Parade at Disneyland Park
text:
The Main Street Electrical Parade , one of the most popular parades in Disney history, has returned home to Disneyland park with all the lights, sounds, music and fun that have made it a beloved icon. Today, weâ€™re giving you a glimpse behind the scenes at what it takes to get some of our performers ready for the show each night.

The court dancers in the Cinderella unit have been part of the parade since its debut in 1972. With nightly performances scheduled through June 18, you have a limited time to get out to the park and see them as part of this special, encore engagement of The Main Street Electrical Parade!
